skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
If any problems occur when using this skill, you can contact us at monstersmart@monsterproducts.com

You can simply ask Alexa to turn on, turn off or dim the light. There’s no need to go to the switch to adjust you home light - just talk to Alexa on your Amazon Echo, Echo Dot, Amazon Tap or Echo Show. 
After connecting Alexa to your Monster Smart products in a few simple steps:
(1). Download our "Monster Smart" app on Google Play Store or Apple AppStore;
(2). Register one Monster Smart account in our "Monster Smart" app;
(3). You need to have some Monster Smart or Tuya-compatible products available to pair;
(4). Configure these devices in our "Monster Smart" app and change appropriate name for your devices which will be used in "Monster Smart" skills;
(5). Download Amazon "Alexa" app from android, ios or Amazon app market;
(6). Configure Echo with "Alexa" app;
(7). Search "Monster Smart" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category;
(8). Click Enable skill of "Monster Smart", and you'll be navigated to Monster Smart login page;
(9). Input your Monster Smart account username and password, you'll be redirect to the success page;
(10). Now all setup is finished. 
You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
“Alexa, turn on the kitchen light"
“Alexa, turn off the kitchen light"
“Alexa, dim livingroom light"
“Alexa, brighten livingroom light"
“Alexa, set the livingroom light to 20 percent"
“Alexa, set bedroom light to Blue"
“Alexa, turn on bedroom air conditioner"

Currently this skill supports products:
smart light strip,
smart light bulb,
smart power plug,
smart power strip,
smart wall tap, 
smart IR blaster,
smart aroma diffuser,
smart door bell with video camera,
smart digital photo frame,
